content.question: The Northwest Ordinances did which of the following?

choices.label: Provided for the annexation of the Oregon Territory.
Granted settlers a free homestead of 160 acres.
Established the terms for settlement and admission of new states.
Banned slavery north of the 36° 30′ line.

content.answer: Established the terms for settlement and admission of new states.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
